entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.1°C

Visibility: 32.2 km

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of snow near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 February 2023
